rows.label: tlk70000042_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I don't know what we're going to do
with that husband of Chiko-san's.

rows.label: tlk70000042_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Seems like he spends all his time
fishing and won't come home.

rows.label: tlk70000042_04_msg0003
rows.name:
That sort of free spirit is rare in Iira,
you know. Most of us are earnest,
dedicated types.

rows.label: tlk70000042_04_msg0004
rows.name:
He's not got an ounce of practicality
in him, but I can't hate him for it.
Sometimes I even envy him a little...
